interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Kpdoit Wireless Pen Mini Machine Pen and Kit Digital LED Display 2200mAh Professional Supply for Artists
Review Date: 2022/06/28
Store: Kpdoit
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Kpdoit', 'Style': 'German', 'Water Resistance Level': 'Waterproof', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '3.9 x 2.3 x 7.4 inches; 12.77 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Kpdoit110', 'Manufacturer': 'Kpdoit'}
Review Text: This is officially my new favorite tattoo pen! Wireless really is the best way to go especially for beginners! Easier to maneuver! It's not the lightest pen but it's not crazy heavy either! Battery life is CRAZY long too! Definitely recommend!
Review Title: Wireless is best!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Boiess Colognes Poppy mint For Moms, Babies & Kids | Natural Eau de Cologne | Clean & Fresh Scent | Children Fragrance For Soft & Sensitive Skin | Easy Use, Gentle on Baby | Size: 8.5 FL Oz
Boiess

This is labeled as babys cologne but omg it smells good enough for ALL to wear!!!  Its clean yet lightly floral!
Smells Soooo Good!!
Boiess Colognes Poppy mint For Moms, Babies & Kids | Natural Eau de Cologne | Clean & Fresh Scent | Children Fragrance For Soft & Sensitive Skin | Easy Use, Gentle on Baby | Size: 8.5 FL Oz
Boiess
{'Brand': 'Boiess', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Item Volume': '8 Fluid Ounces', 'Scent': 'Poppymint', 'Special Feature': 'Dermatoligist tested, Pediatrician tested, Clean, Natural, Cruelty Free, Plant based, Hypoallegenic', 'Package Dimensions': '6.38 x 2.17 x 2.17 inches; 8.5 Ounces', 'UPC': '860007057533', 'Country of Origin': 'Spain'}
I really am loving this brand!!! I have 2 different scents now and they are both clean and floral smelling! It says its for babies but me and my teenage daughters prefer this soft scent vs bath and body works!!! Now i just need to buy the 3rd scent mint poppy !
Smells soft and clean!!!
AIFAIFA 9Pcs Gel Nail Polish Set, Burgundy Nail Polish Kits Red Colors Soak Off UV/LED Nail Polish Set, Gel Polish with Base Coat & Glossy & Matte Top All-Season Salon Manicure Art Design Red
AIFAIFA
{'Brand': 'AIFAIFA', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Color': 'Burgundy,Red', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy, Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic', 'Unit Count': '9.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '9', 'Package Dimensions': '7.99 x 4.21 x 2.83 inches; 11.99 Ounces'}
The shades are not exactly as pictured but still nice! I like that they cure QUICK!  Some brands are too thick or something and require a long time to cure but this one was done in one 5 min session!
Cured quickly!
AllWell Beauty Masking Kit | Moisturizing Exfoliating Botanical Radiant Face and Body Mask | With Red Maple, Safflower, & Lavender | Made in the USA | Vegan, Cruelty-Free | 3.38 Fl Oz. Jar + Applicator (Self Care Kit)
AllWell AllOver
{'Brand': 'AllWell AllOver', 'Scent': 'Lavender', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Unit Count': '3.38 Ounce', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Product Dimensions': '5.25 x 4.25 x 4.13 inches; 12.31 Ounces', 'UPC': '850012824275'}
Only thing i liked is headband! It holds all your hair back securely! The mask made me itchy! Its extremely thick and the ingredients are not as clean as i hoped! The spatula it came with has sharp edges that im too scared to use looks like it would scratch my face!
Mask is weird

Magnetic Eyelashes with Eyeliner Kit, SOTICA 10Pairs Magnetic Lashes Natural False Eyelashes with Tweezers DIY Eyelash Extension Kit Authentic Eyelash Extension Look Easy to Use No Glue Needed…
Sotica
{'Package Dimensions': '9.26 x 5.95 x 0.83 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'CS-JM-8'}
Really impressed with these lashes they ACTUALLY WORK! I applied 2 layers of magnetic eyeliner and the lashes stuck on IMMEDIATELY!!! I also had no trouble when it was time to wash them off! I used my regular soap and whatever was left on my eyelids i wiped off with coconut oil! Super simple! Definitely recommend!
Works really good!

These charms arrived properly packaged! Very cute looking but unfortunately not very practical for me! It snags on my hair cuz of the size of it! I think they are really pretty but will have to put them to use on crafts or something!

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Fragrance Preference:** Enjoys clean, fresh scents with floral notes, particularly lavender, appealing to a broad demographic.

- **Product Sensitivity:** Values gentle formulations suitable for children and sensitive skin, prioritizing safety and comfort in her choices.

- **Natural Ingredients:** Strong preference for natural, cruelty-free, and hypoallergenic products, reflecting a commitment to environmentally friendly practices. Recent concerns regarding ingredient transparency remain prominent.

- **Versatility:** Appreciates products aimed at children, engaging in bonding experiences with her daughters, showcasing a flexible consumer approach.

- **Quality Consideration:** Engages critically with products, prioritizing quality and effectiveness. Positive experiences with beauty items bolster her focus on usability and performance, now extending into artistic applications, particularly in body art.

- **Positive Engagement:** Open to trying offerings from trusted brands while maintaining a cautious stance on health and usability, evolving her approach towards self-care and beauty items.

- **Nail and Eye Care Interest:** Actively expanding her beauty care repertoire, showing significant interest in nail products and eye makeup. A discerning approach demonstrates that while aesthetics are appealing, she prioritizes functionality, evident in her experiences with artistic tools.

Overall, this user remains meticulous in her choices, balancing safety, natural ingredients, and effective performance while seeking enjoyable self-care experiences for herself and her children. Her growing interest in body art reflects a willingness to explore new avenues within her established preferences for quality and usability.
